backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting configuration for music player audio source using frontend/.env.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend source files and environment docs.
frontend/.env: Sets VITE_HUM_TERE_PYAAR_MEIN_AUDIO_SRC to the uploaded MP3 asset for MusicPlayer playback.
frontend/.env.example: Provides commented examples for configuring the audio source environment variable, defaulting to empty.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light/dark theme color variables and global background/text styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing layout with floating effects, music player, hero, love letter, and valentine proposal sections.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Generates animated floating heart icons rising across the screen with randomized timing and size.
frontend/src/components/FloatingMessages: Shows looping romantic text messages floating horizontally with staggered animations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Romantic footer with heart icons, Dhara dedication, and caffeine.ai attribution for 2026.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with Dhara branding, smooth-scroll navigation, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Intro section with Dhara monogram, greeting message, decorations, and a button to jump to the valentine proposal.
frontend/src/components/LoveLetter.tsx: Decorated love letter card containing personalized romantic text and floral graphics.
frontend/src/components/LoveQuiz.tsx: Empty file with no implemented quiz component.
frontend/src/components/Memories.tsx: Displays a grid of themed memory images with captions and decorative animations.
frontend/src/components/MusicPlayer.tsx: Provides an audio player with play, volume, mute, and fallback tone generation when no audio source is available.
frontend/src/components/Sparkles.tsx: Generates floating sparkle icons positioned randomly with animated effects.
frontend/src/components/ValentineProposa: Shows an interactive Valentine prompt where the 'No' button moves away and triggers animations upon answering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes related queries when it updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication, exposing login, logout, identity state, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module exporting nothing for a frontend-only app.
frontend/src/hooks/useSmoothScroll.ts: Provides a helper to smoothly scroll to page sections by ID.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind setup, fonts, theme variables, and custom animations for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, extended theme settings, animations, and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
